Henrietta Niger

  1. Foster Name: Henrietta
  2. Foster Family: Thomas J. and Mary Workman Mainard
  3. Foster Family Alt: Maynard
  4. Location of Family: Fillmore County, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  6. Arrival Place: Exeter, NE
  7. Age on Arrival: 5
  8. Date of Birth: 1896-06-09, Germany
  9. Date of Death: 1989-06, California
  10. Gender: female
  11. Married Name: Henrietta (Weins) Wiens
  12. Spouse Name: Peter Wiens
  13. Source: Exeter Journal, 1902 June 7; Exeter Journal, 1902 June 14; Patricia J. Young and Frances E. Marks, Tears on Paperâ€¯: The History and Life Stories of the Orphan Train Riders (n.p., 1990), p. 295, 319; OTR 195; Eloise Thomsen Corres.
